name: Fireworks (itch) (JERIC GAMES)
description:
Firework is a simple game of touching and sliding ball and make it explode to see the Fireworks. 

Players use their finger to touch (or you can use mouse) and slide the ball that fly up into the screen. As the game progresses, more ball come up into the screen,
 and player can slide multiple ball at once to make a score combos. 
if the Timer Bomb on the downside of the screen is over the game is end.
Also, the FAKE Ball eventually appear on the screen, and if players Touch or slide it those by accident they will also deducted a score and Bomb Timer by 5 (except if you play the Firework Hell you earn a game end on the screen).
Also the FAKE ball is change color in no time so be aware and focus. You can see the Color of FAKE ball on the upper right on your screen.
And also the Gold ball is appear to on your screen and if you Touch and slide it you earn a plus 5 Gold
The goal is to gain as many score as possible, while more ball and FAKE ball appear on the screen.
